title: Ekko
body: Anyone else experience a glitch with ekko where he stops in place for 1-5 secs, and it isn't a connectivity thing im sure? its something I've noticed and not brought up since I started the game in 7.2, as an otp, it annoys me lol

replies.body: WIthout much more info it kinda sounds like this might be packet loss causing some stutters. I would be sure to run a traceroute for at least 5-10 min to our NA servers at 104.160.131.1 to check for any packet loss going on. Let me know what that trace says about packet loss and we can start troubleshooting from there.
